dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Imagine a neighborhood watch, but on a national scale, with official medals and cash prizes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Imagine a neighborhood watch, but on a national scale, with official medals and cash prizes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh citizens who actively assist in preventing offenses may soon receive official recognition, gifts, monetary rewards, and even honorary titles under a new bill on crime prevention presented in the Mazhilis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's exactly what's happening in Kazakhstan, right? This new bill on crime prevention is proposing that citizens who help prevent crimes could get gifts, money, even honorary titles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's exactly what's happening in Kazakhstan, right? This new bill on crime prevention is proposing that citizens who help prevent crimes could get gifts, money, even honorary titles.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh citizens who actively assist in preventing offenses may soon receive official recognition, gifts, monetary rewards, and even honorary titles under a new bill on crime prevention presented in the Mazhilis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it was presented by Deputy Interior Minister Igor Lepekha. He said it completely revises the approach to involving the public.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it was presented by Deputy Interior Minister Igor Lepekha. He said it completely revises the approach to involving the public.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The draft law, titled On the Prevention of Offenses, was introduced by Deputy Interior Minister Igor Lepekha. According to him, the bill revises the approach to involving the public in crime prevention and outlines updated incentives for their participation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So right now, only the internal affairs bodies can recruit these public assistants. But this new law would let all law enforcement agencies do it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So right now, only the internal affairs bodies can recruit these public assistants. But this new law would let all law enforcement agencies do it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, only internal affairs bodies can recruit public assistants to help maintain public order. The new legislation would extend this authority to all law enforcement agencies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a huge expansion of the program. And the role itself is getting bigger, too. It's not just about being an extra set of eyes anymore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a huge expansion of the program. And the role itself is getting bigger, too. It's not just about being an extra set of eyes anymore.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new legislation would extend this authority to all law enforcement agencies. The role of public assistants is also expanding.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the incentives are pretty substantial. We're talking letters of appreciation, state awards... and monetary compensation, which is a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the incentives are pretty substantial. We're talking letters of appreciation, state awards... and monetary compensation, which is a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The most active will be rewarded " with letters of appreciation, gifts, state awards, honorary titles, and monetary compensation, Lepekha explained during the presentation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It makes you wonder how they'll decide who gets what, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It makes you wonder how they'll decide who gets what, though.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, according to the draft, local commissions under the akimats will figure out the procedures and conditions for handing out those rewards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, according to the draft, local commissions under the akimats will figure out the procedures and conditions for handing out those rewards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Local commissions under akimats (local government administrations) will determine the procedures and conditions for granting such incentives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it'll be decentralized, handled at the local government level. That makes sense, um, for tailoring it to different communities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it'll be decentralized, handled at the local government level. That makes sense, um, for tailoring it to different communities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a fascinating shift towards incentivizing civic duty in a very tangible way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a fascinating shift towards incentivizing civic duty in a very tangible way.
